1.0.name: wordpress/wp-contextual-affiliate-ads
1.0.description:
Display Keyword Targeted Contextual Amazon Clickbank and Ebay Ads on WordPress Posts  Automatically! WordPress Adsensor  WPAdsensor shows your Amazon, ClickBank and Ebay affiliate ads based on the Keywords of Your Posts and displays only relevant or Targeted Affiliate Ads.It is very easy to install and use the wordpress paypal button plugin script g with the best options and configurations that are not available in any other plugin. Even A Beginner or a kid can insert paypal payment buttons in wordpress pages and posts! Grab it and begin selling any stuff from your Word-Press site in about 10 minutes from now! It really is that simple.

  • Tested, and working, in Wordpress 3.01
